articles.title: Many Letters to Kim Jong Un from KPA Service Personnel and People
articles.content:
Many Letters to Kim Jong Un from KPA Service Personnel and People
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a lot of letters of pledge from service personnel and people of the DPRK. 
					 Every letter fully reflects the ardent longing of the service personnel and people for General Secretary Kim Jong Il and their intense loyalty and firm faith to advance forever along the road indicated by him, steadfastly inheriting the bloodline of Mt. Paektu no matter what happens in the world.
					
					 Ri Ul Sol, anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter, lamented deeply, saying he could not raise his head, feeling guilty of failing to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as a member of the first generation of the revolution.
					
					 The service personnel of the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army expressed irrepressible longing for the leader who left so many legends about his loving care during his long journeys for Songun leadership.
					
					 O Kil Sun, daughter of former anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter O Jung Hup, the bereaved family of Kim Ik Hyon, the bereaved family of Kang Yong Chang, former president of the State Academy of Sciences, and other bereaved sons and daughters and families of revolutionaries said they felt heart-rending at the thought that Kim Jong Il passed away on a running train after undergoing all sorts of hardships.
					
					 The employees of the Mokran Video Company missed very much Kim Jong Il who was so satisfied with the fact that the company came to distribute more cultural media to the people and soldiers.
					
					 Employees of the Electronics Development Company and those of a unit under the August 28 Foreign Trade Administration Bureau and other working people of various circles courteously proposed the erection of the statue of Kim Jong Il, saying that it was pity they failed to erect his statue in his lifetime.
					
					 Employees of the Korean Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee stressed that Kim Jong Il would live forever along with the immortal flower, flower of the sun.
					
					 Service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces vowed to faithfully uphold the Songun revolutionary leadership of the Party in the van with arms for devotedly defending the leader.
					
					 Officials of Kim Il Sung Higher Party School, the Supreme Prosecutors' Office, the Supreme Court, University of National Economics and the Hoeryong City Committee of North Hamgyong Province of the Workers' Party of Korea vowed to devote themselves to protecting the safety and authority, idea and cause of Kim Jong Un, following the work style displayed by officials in the period of laying down the Party's foundation to carry forward the cause of Juche in the 1970s.
					
					 Officials of the Secretariat of the Cabinet, the State Planning Commission, ministries and national institutions, workers of the Chollima Steel Complex, the Rakwon Machine Complex and the East Pyongyang Thermal-power Plant and builders of the youth shock brigade for railways on the northern tip of the country and the Huichon Power Station evinced their determination to bring about great innovations and leap forward on all fronts as required by the idea and intention of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Officials and workers of the units in the field of light industry associated with the leadership exploits renewed their pledge to boost the production of quality consumer goods favored and recognized by people.
					
					 Letters from the agricultural workers of the Wonhwa Co-operative Farm, Phyongwon County, South Phyongan Province, the Sinam Co-operative Farm, Ryongchon County, North Phyongan Province and the Pisan Co-operative Farm, Anbyon County, Kangwon Province reflected the high revolutionary enthusiasm to remain true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un by solving the food problem of the people without fail.
					
					 Officials, scientists and creators of the State Academy of Sciences, the Mansudae Art Studio, the Paektusan Architectural Institute and the Korean Scriptwriting Company presented letters to Kim Jong Un with the firm determination to lead the industrial revolution in the new century with ultra-modern science and research achievements and give free rein to the mental strength of masses by producing masterpieces of the era.
					
					 Officials of the Central Committees of the General Federation of Trade Unions, the Union of Agricultural Workers and the Democratic Women's Union of Korea pledged themselves to creditably discharge their missions as organizations for mass education and transmission belts of the Party by uniting people of various circles closer around Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Officials of the Central Committee of Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League resolved to devotedly defend the respected supreme commander just as hot-blooded fighters did to protect Hanbyol and many young people including the students of the 4th Class of 6th Grade of East Pyongyang Secondary School No. 1 ardently volunteered to join the People's Army.
					
					 Students and pupils of schools at various levels including Kim Il Sung University, Kim Jong Suk Secondary School No. 1 and Pyongyang Pulgungori Primary School also vowed to steadfastly carry forward the lifeblood of the Juche revolution and baton of the cause of Songun.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim on Working Measures to Boost Juche Fertilizer
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim on Working Measures to Boost Juche Fertilizer
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Premier Choe Yong Rim on Friday learned on the spot about the work at the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex, the nation's leading chemical industrial base.
					 The officials and other working people of the complex are registering signal successes in the production from the outset of the year, highly proud of working in the site associated with the history of immortal leadership of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The premier looked round various places including compressor shop and petrochemical process to acquaint himself in detail with production and operation of the complex. He convened a working consultative meeting of officials concerned on issues of increasing the production of Juche fertilizer. 
					
					 The meeting discussed the issues of devotedly carrying out the militant tasks set forth by Kim Jong Il during his field guidance to the complex on the principle of absoluteness and unconditionality and updating the overall production processes on the basis of the latest science and technology to send more Juche fertilizer to countryside.
					
					 It also discussed specific measures to be taken by power and coal industries to ensure a satisfactory supply of electricity and coal needed for the production of Juche fertilizer and those to be taken by the field of railway transport to minutely command the transport so as to send the coal produced at the coal mines to thermal power stations and industrial establishments without delay.

articles.title: Congratulations to Spanish FM
articles.content:
Congratulations to Spanish FM
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Friday sent a congratulatory message to Jose Manuel Garcia upon his appointment as foreign minister of Spain.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop on good terms and wished him success in his new job.

articles.title: Congratulations to FM of Tunisia
articles.content:
Congratulations to FM of Tunisia
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun on Friday sent a congratulatory message to Rafik Abdessalem upon his appointment as foreign minister of Tunisia.
					 In the message Pak wished him success in his job, expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between two countries would continue to favorably develop.

articles.title: AP Delegation Arrives Here
articles.content:
AP Delegation Arrives Here 
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Associated Press of the United States headed by its President and Chief Executive Officer Thomas Curley arrived here on Saturday.

articles.title: AP President Interviewed upon Arrival in Pyongyang
articles.content:
AP President Interviewed upon Arrival in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Thomas Curley, president of the Associated Press of the United States, was interviewed by reporters at Pyongyang Airport Saturday.
					 AP has been talking with KCNA for a year to try to extend bureau relationship, he said, adding he is hopeful that these meetings would move forward and will reach some new agreements.
					
					 Opening a bureau in Pyongyang is very important for AP, he said.

articles.title: "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" (Enlarged Version) Published
articles.content:
"Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" (Enlarged Version) Published
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out Vol. 13 (enlarged version) of "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" which comprehends famous works of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The book contains 22 works including speeches, talks and letters he made public in the period from June 1989 to October 1990.
					
					 Among them are works "The Workers' Party of Korea Organizes and Guides All the Victories of Our People" and "Let Us Strengthen the Party and Increase Its Leadership Role" which give scientific exposition of the principled matters arising in party building and activities.
					
					 In works "Let Us Defend and Further Glorify Socialism of Our Style under the Banner of the Juche Idea" and "On Some Issues Related to the Ideological Groundwork of Socialism" he disclosed the reactionary nature of the moves and sophism made by imperialists and modern revisionists to stifle socialism.
					
					 Carried in the work "Let Us Give Full Play to the Korean Nation-First Spirit" is the essence of the Korean nation-first spirit and the distinguished idea and theory on applying this spirit in all realms of social life.
					
					 Works "On Thoroughly Accomplishing the Light Industrial Revolution" and "On Improving and Strengthening Financial and Banking Work" indicate the tasks to be carried out in improving the standard of people's living and pushing ahead with the socialist economic construction.
					
					 "Let Us Prepare the Young People Thoroughly as Reliable Successors to the Revolutionary Cause of Juche", "On Training the Korean Youths in Japan to Be Reliable Successors to the Patriotic Cause" and other works underline the need to prepare the youths as reliable successors to the revolution and steadily advance the movement of Koreans in Japan along the road of Juche.
					
					 There are also works that give answers to theoretical and practical problems arising in different fields of socialist construction.

articles.title: Mongolian President Wishes DPRK Success in Building Thriving Nation
articles.content:
Russian Organization Discusses Measures for Introducing Immortal Exploits of Great Men
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- We will conduct brisk activities in various forms and methods to introduce the greatness and immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il on their birth anniversaries.
					 The Blagobeshensk, Russia, Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Idea said this at its annual meeting held on Jan. 8.
					
					 Its participants were briefed on the main contents of the joint editorial issued by Rodong Sinmun, Joson Inmingun and Chongnyon Jonwi, leading newspapers of the DPRK.
					
					A. I. Donchenko, chief of the Group, noted in his report:
					
					 The demise of Kim Jong Il is a great loss to the Korean revolution and global socialist movement.
					
					 Now that the Korean people have risen up by overcoming their sorrow over his demise with strength and courage, the Russian adherents to the Juche idea and the Songun idea should make positive efforts to defend the Korean revolution and support socialist construction of the Korean people.

articles.title: Music, Dance Performance Given in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Music, Dance Performance Given in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- A music and dance performance "Let Us Uphold Our Supreme Commander Forever" took place before full houses at the April 25 House of Culture from Jan. 11 to 13.
					 The performance, given in the wake of the Unhasu New Year's concert, deeply moved thousands of people, including servicepersons.
					
					 Enjoying the performance, they sorely missed General Secretary Kim Jong Il, hardening their determination to carry forward his cause.
					
					 Kim Jong Hwa, an official of the Ministry of Land and Environmental Conservation, said, "Listening to the songs 'Where Are You, Dear General?' and 'Snow Falls on Road to Front', I thought of the leader with tears in my eyes. His long journey of Songun leadership provided a strong national power of socialist Korea. That is why the Korean people are ardently longing for him."
					
					 Han Yong Ho, a serviceperson, said that when a picture of leader Kim Jong Il appeared on the stage background, he could not help tears running down, thinking of him, who regarded the servicepersons as his sons and daughters and his comrades.
					
					 Kim Kwang Hyok, an officer of the KPA who was honored to perform before leader Kim Jong Il in last December after proving successful at the 35th servicepersons' art festival, said:
					
					 "The chorus 'Leader, Just Give Us Your Order' is the song our company soldiers sang before him. We sang the song with the firm resolution to devotedly defend the Party and the leader, the country and people if the enemy invades our land even an inch.
					
					 I will defend the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by the dear respected Kim Jong Un at the risk of my life and perform heroic feats in the building of a thriving nation."

articles.title: Samjiyon Schoolchildren's Palace
articles.content:
Samjiyon Schoolchildren's Palace
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- The Samjiyon Schoolchildren's Palace is located at the foot of Mt. Paektu in the northern tip of Korea.
					 The palace, reconstructed in 2006, has a floor space of more than 7,700 square meters. It consists of the main building, theater and gymnasium.
					
					 The main building has scores of rooms for schoolchildren's extracurricular activities, as well as astronomical observation and video game facilities and library. After school they come to the palace to learn vocal music, narration, instrumental music, dance and mathematics. They also learn how to operate computer, automobile and tractor.
					
					 The gymnasium with a floor space of some 1,300 square meters is equipped with facilities needed for learning Taekwon-Do, basketball, alpine skiing and other sports events. 
					
					 The well-equipped theater has 300 seats.
					
					 When giving field guidance to Samjiyon County in October Juche 91 (2002), General Secretary Kim Jong Il took measures to reconstruct the palace in a fashionable way to accommodate an increasing number of study tourists.
					
					 After visiting the reconstructed palace in early March 2006, he sent many computers and musical instruments to it.

articles.title: DPRK Will Prosper Forever Thanks to Blessings of Kumsusan (1)
articles.content:
DPRK Will Prosper Forever Thanks to Blessings of Kumsusan (1)
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- The Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea issued a special report declaring that the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il will be laid in state at the Kumsusan Memorial Palace, the sacred temple of Juche.
					 The report evoked a lively response as it reflected the unanimous wishes of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as an eternal leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the revolution.
					
					 Kim Ok Sun, former anti-Japanese revolutionary fighter, said as follows:
					
					 The Kumsusan Memorial Palace is the sacred temple of Juche as it is enshrined in the hearts of all the Koreans.
					
					 Their hearts seem to run to the palace every moment.
					
					 We, anti-Japanese revolutionary veteran fighters, are greatly excited to hear that Kim Jong Il will be laid in state in the sacred temple of Juche, as he dedicated his all to the people all his life.
					
					 Choe Ju Won, teacher at Kim Il Sung University, said:
					
					 When I looked over Kumsusan area upon hearing the special report, I felt as if I had seen the broad smiles of the two great men in the sky above it.
					
					 I am greatly encouraged by the thought that I can visit the palace whenever I miss him as he is laid in state there.
					
					 I will get inspiration, while taking a view of Kumsusan area whenever I missed Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Ri Ju Chol, an official in the field of power industry, said:
					
					 It is heart-rending to think of Kim Jong Il, who underwent all sorts of hardships all his life with a single desire to build a thriving nation on this land as early as possible.
					
					 I feel relieved when thinking that it has become possible to hold him in high esteem and profound reverence forever in reflection of the ardent wishes of all the people, as he passed due to the pent-up fatigue without having good rest even a single day.
					
					 I pledge myself to be a standard-bearer in the on-going general offensive to improve the people's living standard true to the noble intention of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: DPRK Will Prosper Forever Thanks to Blessings of Kumsusan (2)
articles.content:
DPRK Will Prosper Forever Thanks to Blessings of Kumsusan (2)
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Upon hearing the news that General Secretary Kim Jong Il will be laid in state at the Kumsusan Memorial Palace, the hearts of all the Korean people are filled with the pledge to carry to completion the revolutionary cause of Juche generation after generation, remaining loyal to the dear respected Kim Jong Un identical to Kim Jong Il.
					 Kim Tok Hun, official of the Jagang Provincial People's Committee, recollected with deep emotion the honorable days in which he grew up, leading a worthwhile life under the care of the leader. 
					
					It was under his care that he became an official in charge of people's living in a province.
					
					 He said:
					
					 The people can never forget the loving care and painstaking efforts of Kim Jong Il who visited soldiers of the People's Army by crossing "Chol Pass" despite snow and took care of the people's living as their real father would do, calling at factories and walking rural roads early morning. 
					
					 I will devote myself to improving the living standard of the people of Jagang Province whom the leader loved so much, true to his lifetime intention.
					
					 Jong Nam Ho, officer of the Korean People's Army, said:
					
					 We are under Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, another commander of Mt. Paektu.
					
					We will single-mindedly uphold the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un who represents the destiny of Kim Il Sung's nation and is the sun, and unite close around him and thus build a thriving socialist nation on this land without fail. 
					
					 Only eternal happiness and prosperity will be in store for the DPRK under the blessings of Kumsusan.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors Fated to Face Severest Punishment
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Lee Myung Bak Group of Traitors Fated to Face Severest Punishment
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- The anti-DPRK smear campaign of the south Korean puppet forces has reached such pass that the service personnel of the Korean People's Army and people of the DPRK can no longer tolerate it. 
					 During the mourning in December last year, reptile media under the control of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors let loose ridiculous jargons as regards the time and place of the passing of the fatherly General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 They insulted the Korean people who shed bitter tears at the morning centers, describing them as "forced sorrow and orchestrated." Not content with this, they released such misinformation touching off towering resentment that "those who failed to show tears at memorial services were sent to a concentration camp and the military was ordered to kill three generations of those who attempt to defect to the south."
					
					 Intolerable is the hair-raising behavior of the depraved who ceased to live under the same sky with fellow countrymen. 
					
					 Their release of such misinformation was timed to coincide with the date when the DPRK made public amnesty and its contents were craftily tailored against it. This evil deed could be done only by the despicable guys hell-bent on letting loose invectives and telling lies. 
					
					  The group was so much afraid of and upset by the single-minded unity of the DPRK that it got frantic with a smear campaign to play down the essence of the amnesty and slander Korean style socialism centered on the popular masses. 
					
					 The mourning period offered the world an ample opportunity to know about the real picture of the single-minded unity of the DPRK where the leader and the army and the people form an integral whole. The group of traitors hell-bent on the anti-DPRK campaign could hardly understand the weight and sincerity of the tears shed by the service personnel and people of the DPRK and nothing polite could be heard from it. These guys who ceased to be human beings could hardly imagine the feelings of crowds of loyalists who followed the car carrying the bier of the leader in bitter tears, removing the heavy snow by use of their padded clothes and mufflers.
					
					 They are pitiable human scum who can never become part of the nation no matter how often they are reborn.
					
					 No wonder, personages of Russia and other countries issued declarations of conscience before the world in clear denial of the puppet forces' smear propaganda.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK feel towering hatred as well as redoubled conviction of victory when seeing this sorry sight of the hostile forces. 
					
					 They will as ever consolidate their single-minded unity in every way no matter what others may say and dynamically advance only along the chosen road. 
					
					 The Lee group, hell-bent on slinging mud with collections of the world's worst invectives, deserves the severest punishment by justice and truth. 
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK will force the puppet group to pay the dearest price generation after generation for decrying their single-minded unity, while hurting even the dignity of the supreme leadership, and working hard to lead the north to what it called "change."

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Projected Mendicant Diplomacy under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Projected Mendicant Diplomacy under Fire
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade was reported to have submitted its "working  plan for 2012" to traitor Lee Myung Bak recently.
					 In the plan it claimed the great loss to the DPRK "increased the uncertainty" of the situation on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 It also said the ministry, therefore, deemed it as a major goal of its foreign policy to "safely cope with it" and underscored the need to "lead the north to make a switchover in its attitude towards the inter-Korean relations" in close cooperation with neighbors and pursue "Grand Bargain" policy in a bid to bring about "progress in the settlement of the north's nuclear issue".
					
					 Minju Joson Saturday observes in a by-lined commentary in this regard:
					
					 The "uncertainty of the situation" touted by the ministry betrays its black-hearted expectation for the DPRK's political chaos.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is the group of traitors' intention to closely cooperate with neighbors in "leading the north to a change".
					
					 The crimes committed by the group against ethics during the nation's mourning over the great loss deprived the group of its last opportunity to deal with the DPRK. 
					
					 Under this situation the Lee group seeks to woo its neighbors into the moves to cover up its crimes and, furthermore, make them accomplices in the acts of rejecting the north-south declarations.
					
					 Whoever joins in these moves will never be pardoned by the Korean nation.
					
					 The working plan of the ministry reflects the ulterior intention of Lee Myung Bak to do harm to his fellow countrymen.
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that Lee, upbeat to receive the plan, had a working discussion on "diplomacy of contribution" for about an hour.
					
					 It is clear that under the plan the puppet minions will get busy with solicitation diplomacy in the international arena to do harm to the fellow countrymen. 
					
					 With no solicitation diplomacy can the group save itself from the fate of living dead as it has already received a death sentence from the Korean nation.

articles.title: S. Korea: Railway Workers' Union Protests against Unpopular Rule
articles.content:
S. Korea: Railway Workers' Union Protests against Unpopular Rule
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- The railway workers' union in south Korea held a press conference on Wednesday to condemn the unpopular rule by the puppet authorities, according to MBC of south Korea.
					 The organization rejected the railway-related system to be introduced by the Ministry of Land and Marine Affairs as that of destroying the safety and public nature in railways.
					
					 It demanded the authorities to immediately repeal the plan of privatizing the railways aimed to give privilege to the monopolistic capital.
					
					 Then the organization staged a protest outside the "government" building after presenting to the ministry an open questionnaire on the privatization of the railways.

articles.title: Suspicion about Sinking of Warship "Cheonan" by U.S. Sub Raised
articles.content:
Suspicion about Sinking of Warship "Cheonan" by U.S. Sub Raised
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- South Korean Internet newspaper Jaju Minbo carried on Thursday an article dealing with the suspicion about the sinking of the warship "Cheonan" by a U.S. submarine. 
					 The article recalled that the military authorities took the stern of the warship towards a shore before telling the members of a civilian salvage team to leave the place. 
					
					 They had banned anyone's access to it for two days, it added.
					
					 Divers of the U.S. forces were engaged in a diving operation in the nearby waters and several helicopters were seen transporting something nonstop for these two days, the article noted, and continued:
					
					 South Korean army's divers had conducted a diving operation in those waters before the stern was taken to the shore. They testified to the fact that they saw a big structure on the seabed.
					
					 The structure was believed to be a submarine capable of staffing about 38 crewmen as its inside had a mass of pipes.
					
					 All these facts provide two reasons for the warship's sinking. 
					
					 First, the submarine and the warship "Cheonan" accidentally collided with each other that resulted in breaking the warship into two pieces and sending the submarine into the bottom of the sea. 
					
					 Second, two U.S. submarines sank because of mistaken cross-firing or an accident inside them. In that case a U.S. nuclear submarine might ram into "Cheonan" to break it into two pieces when it was rushing on a rescue mission.
					
					 Pretending to salvage the warship, the U.S. divers might clear the dead bodies, dangerous missiles, etc. out of the U.S. sub. 
					
					 The authorities claimed it was a trading vessel which sank 60 years ago, but the results of an analysis concluded that its shape was fully identical to a submarine, not a trading vessel.
					
					 The warship appears more likely to be sunk by a U.S. submarine with the passage of time.

articles.title: Salvage of Warship "Cheonan" Deliberately Delayed: S. Korean Inhabitant
articles.content:
Salvage of Warship "Cheonan" Deliberately Delayed: S. Korean Inhabitant
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- It was disclosed that the south Korean puppet authorities deliberately delayed the salvage of the warship "Cheonan" after it was sank. 
					 An employee of a civilian enterprise who took part in the salvage of the warship at that time testified to this fact in the course of a trial of Sin Sang Chol, who was a member of the joint investigation team, held at the Seoul Central District Court on Jan. 9. 
					
					 According to him, those concerned of the enterprise arrived at the scene of the incident on April 3, 2010. On Apr. 12 they salvaged the stern of the sunken warship by a crane. 
					
					 At that time, they could transfer it directly to other cargo ship, but at the instruction of the military authorities, it was put into seawater, covered with net, before being taken towards a shore. 
					
					 Claiming that the salvage operation had to be suspended due to bad weather, the military authorities told members of the salvage team to leave the place except the crane operator. 
					
					 Then they had banned anyone's access to the stern for two days. 
					
					 It was only on Apr. 15 that they let the workers transfer the stern to the cargo ship and set up a curtain around it. They were known to have done something by themselves all night. 
					
					 Disclosing this fact, the employee of the enterprise said that it was easy to transfer the stern of such weight to the cargo ship without taking it to the shallow water. 
					
					 In this regard, lawyers held that the military authorities should clarify why they deliberately delayed the salvage of the warship.

articles.title: S. Korea: Freedom of Expression Demanded
articles.content:
S. Korea: Freedom of Expression Demanded
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Personages of different circles in south Korea called a press conference on Jan. 11 in denunciation of the puppet authorities' fascist crackdown.
					 Speakers at the conference pointed out that the Kyonggi district police agency and the Suwon district prosecutor's office have tried to detain Pak Jong Gun, a member of the Social Party, after persecuting him on charges of violation of the "National Security Law".
					
					 The puppet Kyonggi district police agency reportedly searched Pak's house and office in September last year and summoned him several times to investigate.
					
					 The fascist security authorities committed such actions for the mere reason that he took part in the sit-in strike of evacuees in Ryongsan, the campaign for "bus of hope", rally to get the university registration fee halved, etc., and praised the DPRK.
					
					 The speakers charged that such repression is aimed to trample down on the freedom of thought by dint of NSL.
					
					 The NSL serves as the means of suppression to maintain the power, they said, urging the authorities to abrogate the evil law and ensure freedom of expression.

articles.title: Combined War Exercises of S. Korean Puppet Forces in Areas along MDL Projected
articles.content:
Combined War Exercises of S. Korean Puppet Forces in Areas along MDL Projected
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- The 8th corps of the puppet army of south Korea announced on Friday that it would launch combined military exercises in Kosong County, Kangwon Province of south Korea, a forefront area, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					This saber-rattling will be reportedly staged twice from Jan. 16 to 20 and from Feb. 6 to 10 with huge armed forces and offensive means belonging to the corps involved.
					
					 The war racket of the south Korean puppet forces against the DPRK is reaching a serious phase with each passing day with its operational theatre getting close to the MDL.

articles.title: GNP at Strife over Irregularities in S. Korea
articles.content:
GNP at Strife over Irregularities in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Fractions of the "Grand National Party" in south Korea have recently disputed with each other, revealing their dirty colors stained with irregularities of their own accord.
					 Ex-Chairman Hong Jun Phyo and lawmaker Won Hui Ryong from the GNP on Jan. 10 raised suspicion that the election of candidate within the party was based on money during the "presidential" elections in 2007.
					
					 In this regard, public opinion has claimed that the proposed doubt is aimed at Pak Kun Hye, who contested with Lee Myung Bak at that time, as Hong and Won are from the Lee fraction.
					
					 Meanwhile, former lawmaker Kim Jae Won, who is from the Pak fraction, told reporters that there was a bribery scandal at the time of the election of proportional-representation candidates for the 18th-term "National Assembly" led by the pro-Lee Myung Bak group.
					
					 On Jan. 11, an unidentified person concerned disclosed through media that the enveloped money was distributed during the 2006 GNP Congress which witnessed the fierce rivalry between the two fractions.
					
					 Commenting on this situation, media ridiculed that the spectacular campaign to disclose the cases of slush fund within the ruling GNP will lead the conflict between its fractions to the division of the party and then to its end.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Support Joint New Year Editorial of DPRK
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Support Joint New Year Editorial of DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) met at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Thursday to express support for the joint New Year editorial of the DPRK.
					 Present at the meeting were Ho Jong Man, chief vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, and Chongryon officials from different sectors.
					
					 All the participants paid a silent tribute in humble reverence to the memory of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Ho Jong Man said in his report that Kim Jong Il was the great leader and very kind-hearted teacher and father as he guided Chongryon and the movement of Koreans in Japan along the road of victory and showed warm care and benevolence for the officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Chongryon will hold President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem forever to the end of the sun and the moon and uphold the dear respected Kim Jong Un as the centre of unity and leadership, the reporter said.
					
					 He stressed the need for Chongryon to hold aloft the slogan "Let us lay a spring board for bringing a new heyday of Chongryon in 2012 under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, true to the behests of the great General Kim Jong Il!" this significant year.
					
					 Chongryon will make tangible contributions to the independent reunification and prosperity of the homeland and strive for friendship between the two peoples between the DPRK and Japan, he said.
					
					 It will also conduct more vigorously the movement for national reunification under the banner of "By our nation itself" this year marking the fifth anniversary of the publication of the October 4 declaration, a program for implementing the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 Then oath-making speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted there.
					
					 The letter said that as descendants of Kim Il Sung and disciples of Kim Jong Il the officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan would grandiosely commemorate the Day of the Sun, the centenary of birth of Kim Il Sung, and the Day of the Shining Star, the 70th anniversary of birth of Kim Jong Il, this historic year as the greatest holidays of the Korean nation and the world people and strikingly display their patriotism and loyalty to steadily inherit one idea and one bloodline.

articles.title: Film Show Held by Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Film Show Held by Koreans in Japan
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- The Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) Thursday arranged a film show at the Korean Hall in Tokyo, Japan.
					 Present there were Chief Vice-Chairman Ho Jong Man and vice-chairmen of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, the chairman of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon, advisors and department directors of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, the permanent advisor and director of the Research Institute on History of Korean Residents in Japan, leading officials of central organizations and enterprises of Chongryon, chairmen of the Chongryon headquarters in the Kanto area and its chapters and officials in education, economy, media and publication, culture and art, sports and other fields.
					
					 The participants watched the documentary film that deals with the revolutionary activities of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army who visited the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the KPA honored with the title of the O Jung Hup-led Seventh Regiment to congratulate the service persons on the New Year's Day. 
					
					 They also appreciated a film that shows the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un creditably carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Songun started in Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Hit at Lee Myung Bak's Treason
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Hit at Lee Myung Bak's Treason
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- O Jae Se, chairman of the Kanagawa Prefectural Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, on January 12 issued a statement with towering wrath and hatred toward the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors in south Korea.
					 It is quite natural for each Korean to express condolences over the demise of the benevolent father of the nation and share sorrow with his or her fellow countrymen and, moreover, it is good manners and customs peculiar to Korea, a country of courteous people in the East, and its ancestral tradition of etiquette to mourn before the bier of any deceased, the statement said.
					
					 However, the Lee group, regardless of the nation or elementary human reason and morality, persistently checked the memorial services of south Koreans and dispatch of their mourners' groups, forcibly dismantled the mourning stations and deleted the phrase of "demise" from all condolatory messages, thus committing hideous anti-national and unethical treason, it charged.
					
					 No sooner had an announcement on the great loss to the nation been made than the group issued "emergency alert order" to the puppet army for war posture and let the right-wing conservative organizations scatter handbills slandering the supreme leadership of the DPRK on the frontline areas, calling for "taking counteraction to the north by separating inhabitants from their leadership", the statement pointed out.
					
					 We will never pardon the treason committed by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors who, obsessed by the wild dream of "unification of systems", ran riot, regarding the great loss of the nation as a "good chance," it said.
					
					 The group is clamoring about "change in the north", but it is a daydream, the statement said, adding:
					
					 Standing in the van of the cause of national reunification is the dear respected Kim Jong Un, another peerless patriot. The single-minded unity of the DPRK is growing stronger.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle Supported Abroad
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle Supported Abroad
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- The Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association released a statement on Jan. 7 in support of the joint New Year editorial of the DPRK.
					 The statement referred in detail to the fact that the joint editorial reviewed the achievements made by the Korean people last year and indicated the military tasks to be carried out this year.
					
					 The association will as ever express firm support for the Korean people in their struggle for the prosperity and independent and peaceful reunification of the country, it stressed.
					
					 The Canar Provincial Institute for the Friendship and Solidarity with DPRK of Ecuador, in its statement on Jan. 5, said:
					
					  2012 marks the fifth anniversary of the publication of the October 4 Declaration, a programme for implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration.
					
					 To implement the June 15 Joint Declaration and the October 4 Declaration serves as the best way for achieving the reunification of Korea in an independent and peaceful way.
					
					 We are firmly convinced that the Korean people will make a breakthrough towards independent reunification, lifelong desire of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, by uniting closer under the banner of the inter-Korean declarations.
					
					 We will as ever extend unchangeable support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.

articles.title: Mexican Organization Discusses Measures for Deepening Study of Juche Idea, Songun Idea
articles.content:
Mexican Organization Discusses Measures for Deepening Study of Juche Idea, Songun Idea
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- The Mexican National Coordinating Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea held its annual meeting in Mexico City on Jan. 6.
					 The meeting reviewed the activities of the committee last year including memorial events on the demise of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It discussed measures for intensifying the study and dissemination of the Juche idea and the Songun idea this year marking the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung and the 70th anniversary of birth of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The president of the Committee stressed the need for the Mexican adherents to the Juche idea to stand at the head of the world followers of the Juche idea and contribute to the successful World Conference on the Juche Idea.
					
					 He called on the adherents to the Juche idea to make redoubled efforts to intensify their activities, upholding the leadership of Kim Jong Un, great successor to the revolutionary cause of Juche.

articles.title: Russian Organization Discusses Measures for Introducing Immortal Exploits of Great Men
articles.content:
Russian Organization Discusses Measures for Introducing Immortal Exploits of Great Men
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- We will conduct brisk activities in various forms and methods to introduce the greatness and immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il on their birth anniversaries.
					 The Blagobeshensk, Russia, Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Idea said this at its annual meeting held on Jan. 8.
					
					 Its participants were briefed on the main contents of the joint editorial issued by Rodong Sinmun, Joson Inmingun and Chongnyon Jonwi, leading newspapers of the DPRK.
					
					A. I. Donchenko, chief of the Group, noted in his report:
					
					 The demise of Kim Jong Il is a great loss to the Korean revolution and global socialist movement.
					
					 Now that the Korean people have risen up by overcoming their sorrow over his demise with strength and courage, the Russian adherents to the Juche idea and the Songun idea should make positive efforts to defend the Korean revolution and support socialist construction of the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Respecting the Forerunners of the Revolution Is a Noble Moral Obligation of Revolutionaries" was brought out in booklet by the Khabarovsk Territory Publishing House of Russia.
					 The work, published on Dec. 25, Juche 84 (1995), clarifies the idea that it is the demand of the revolution to respect the forerunners of the revolution. It also gives an exposition of principled matters arising in establishing a moral trait of respecting the forerunners and developing the relationship based on noble moral obligation among people.

articles.title: Development of Trade Unions with Chinese Characteristics Urged
articles.content:
Development of Trade Unions with Chinese Characteristics Urged
 Beijing, January 13 (KCNA) -- The 6th Session of the 15th Executive Committee of the All-China Federation of Trade Unions released a decision calling for the development of socialist trade unions with the Chinese characteristics. 
					 The decision urged the trade unions at all the levels to deeply study and widely introduce the way of the development of socialist trade unions. 
					
					 It also underscored the need to enhance their role in accordance with the Communist Party and state affairs and steadily consolidate the party's class background.

articles.title: Hu Jintao Extends Festival Greetings to Army Veterans
articles.content:
Hu Jintao Extends Festival Greetings to Army Veterans
 Beijing, January 13 (KCNA) -- Chinese President Hu Jintao enjoyed a Spring Festival (Lunar New Year) art performance organized by the Chinese Central Military Commission in Beijing Thursday.
					 At the art performance, the president extended Spring Festival greetings to military veterans and ex-commanding officers of the Beijing-based unit.
					
					 At the end of the performance, Hu congratulated artists for their good performance.

articles.title: Businesses Urged to Ensure Quality of Goods in China
articles.content:
Businesses Urged to Ensure Quality of Goods in China
 Beijing, January 13 (KCNA) -- An executive meeting of the Chinese State Council was held on Wednesday.
					 The meeting discussed encouraging businesses to ensure the quality of their products, strengthening supervision over the quality of goods and strictly dealing with illegal practices by law.

articles.title: Cultural Development, Prosperity Urged in China
articles.content:
Cultural Development, Prosperity Urged in China
 Beijing, January 13 (KCNA) -- Liu Yunshan, head of the Publicity Department of the C.C., the Communist Party of China (CPC), called for intensifying combat against porno culture and illegal publications.
					 Speaking at a national video-telephone conference held in Beijing on Monday, Liu said efforts should be made to protect intellectual property rights and standardize the order of cultural dissemination by strictly controlling porno culture.
					
					 It is also important to promote the development and prosperity of culture, defend the harmony and stability of society and provide good cultural environment for a successful opening of the 18th CPC Congress, he added.

articles.title: Large Hydrogen Tank for Rocket Developed in China
articles.content:
Large Hydrogen Tank for Rocket Developed in China
 Beijing, January 13 (KCNA) -- China has succeeded in developing a large hydrogen tank for Long March 5 carrier rocket, a media report said.
					 The tank is five meters in diameter and some twenty meters in length.

articles.title: Russia to Mark Year of Russian History in 2012
articles.content:
Russia to Mark Year of Russian History in 2012
 Moscow, January 13 (KCNA) -- Russian President Dmitri Medvedev recently ratified the decree on holding an event marking the year of the Russian history in 2012.
					 The event aims to arouse public interest in the history of the country and the role Russia has played in the world history.

articles.title: U.S. National Debt Reaches 15.23 Trillion Dollars
articles.content:
U.S. National Debt Reaches 15.23 Trillion Dollars
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- The national debt of the U.S. at present amounted to 15.23 trillion U.S. dollars, according to this country's newspaper USA Today on Jan. 9.
					 Experts foresee the debt will increase to 26 trillion U.S. dollars within ten years to come, it noted.

articles.title: Trade Deficit Increases in Britain
articles.content:
Trade Deficit Increases in Britain
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Britain's trade deficit in November last year reached 8.6 billion pounds (12.9 billion dollars) or an increase of 0.8 billion pounds (1.2 billion U.S. dollars) over the previous month, according to the latest release by the British Office of National Statistics (ONS) on Wednesday.

articles.title: Economic Depression in Japan, Spain
articles.content:
Economic Depression in Japan, Spain
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Japan's benchmark composite economic index in November fell 1.1 points from the previous month, the government said Wednesday.
					 Meanwhile, the house sale amount in Spain dropped 14.4 percent in this period, compared with that of the same month of the previous year. This is attributable to the population's decrease of purchasing power resulting from the worsening economic depression.

articles.title: Iran's President Calls for Heightened Vigilance against Enemies' Moves
articles.content:
Iran's President Calls for Heightened Vigilance against Enemies' Moves
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Iranian President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad called for heightened vigilance against the moves of the enemies. He made the remark in a meeting with his Nicaraguan counterpart Daniel Ortega Saavedra on Wednesday. 
					 He noted that the era of unjust hegemony is over and the global arrogance is on the verge of collapse. 
					
					 History shows that bullying powers easily change their masks to pursue their sinister goals as they have done it before during slavery era and now have changed their strategy as advocates of democracy and human rights, he said.

articles.title: South African President Calls for Reforming UN Security Council
articles.content:
South African President Calls for Reforming UN Security Council 
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- South African President Jacob Gedleyihlekisa Zuma in a speech on Thursday called for reforming the UN Security Council.
					 The absence of African representation in the UN Security Council pointed to the urgency for a "fundamental reform" of the Council, he noted.
					
					 "The failure of representation, on a permanent basis, of such a big part of the globe in an important body such as the UN Security Council, points to the necessity and urgency for the fundamental reform of the UN Security Council so that it can become more representative and legitimate," Zuma said.

articles.title: Nicaragua's Ortega Urges Israel to Destroy Nuclear Arms
articles.content:
Nicaragua's Ortega Urges Israel to Destroy Nuclear Arms
 Pyongyang, January 14 (KCNA) -- Nicaragua's President Daniel Ortega Saavedra on Tuesday urged Israel to destroy its nuclear weapons to foster peace in the Middle East.
					 Western powers are ignoring those with nuclear weapons and threatening a country which only wanted atomic energy for peaceful purposes, Ortega added, pointing to Iran.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe cartas de militares y habitants
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe cartas de militares y habitantes
Pyongyang, 14 de enero (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Maximo Dirigente del partido, el Estado y el ejercito de Corea, sigue recibiendo las cartas de juramento que le dirigen los militares del Ejercito Popular de Corea y los habitantes a lo largo del pais.
					　En las misivas se denotan la gran anoranza al Dirigente Kim Jong Il a quien apoyaba el pueblo coreano con toda su alma, la fidelidad e inconmovible conviccion de los remitentes de marchar por la unica senda del socialismo siguiendo a los continuadores del linaje del monte Paektu aun en medio de cualesquier circunstancias.
					
					　Ri Ul Sol, ex combatiente revolucionario antijapones, expreso en su carta el sentimiento de culpabilidad por no haber ayudado bien al Dirigente Kim Jong Il como miembro de la primera generacion de la Revolucion Coreana.
					
					　Los militares de la Division Guardia de Tanques 105 "Seul" Ryu Kyong Su del EPC extranaron mucho al Dirigente recordando que el dejo muchas leyendas de amor por los soldados en su largo camino del Songun.
					
					　O Kil Sun, hija de O Jung Hup, ex combatiente revolucionario antijapones, los familiares de Kim Ik Hyon, ex combatiente revolucionario antijapones, y de Kang Yong Chang, ex presidente de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, y de otros martires revolucionarios deploraron el fallecimiento en el tren del Dirigente a causa de las fatigas acumuladas mientras superaba las pruebas de toda indole.
					
					　Los empleados de la Compania de Video Mokran recordaron al Dirigente que se habia mostrado satisfecho en su compania por la posibilidad de suministrar al pueblo y los uniformados los multimedias de uso cultural.
					
					　Los trabajadores de la Compania de Desarrollo de Aparatos Electronicos y una unidad dependiente de la Direccion de Comercio Exterior 28 de Agosto propusieron cortesmente la construccion de la estatua de bronce del Dirigente arrepintiendose de no haberlo hecho en su vida.
					
					　Los empleados del Comite Coreano de Kimilsungia y Kimjongilia enfatizaron que el Dirigente sera inmortal junto con Kimjongilia, flor del sol.
					
					　Los oficiales y soldados del EPC y el Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea juraron apoyar al frente la direccion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun del partido con los fusiles dispuestos a defender al Lider a costa de la vida.
					
					　Los funcionarios de la Escuela Superior del Partido Kim Il Sung, la Fiscalia Suprema, el Tribunal Supremo, la Universidad de Economia Nacional, el comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la ciudad de Hoeryong de la provincia de Hamgyong del Norte decidieron dedicar todo lo suyo para defender la seguridad, el prestigio, la idea y la causa del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un como los funcionarios de la epoca de construccion de la base del partido de la decada de 1970.
					
					　Los funcionarios del Secretariado del Consejo de Ministros, el Comite Estatal de Planificacion y otros ministerios y organos centrales, los obreros del Complejo de Acero Chollima, el Complejo de Maquinaria de Rakwon y la Central Termoelectrica de Pyongyang Este y los miembros de la Brigada Juvenil de Construccion de Linea Ferroviaria Septentrional y los constructores de la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon juraron registrar gran innovacion y salto en todos los sectores materializando el proposito y la voluntad de        Kim Jong Un.
					
					　Los funcionarios y la clase obrera de las unidades de industria ligera, en que estan registradas las hazanas de orientacion del Dirigente, subrayaron que produciran mas articulos de consumo de buena calidad que le gusten mucho al pueblo.
					
					　Los trabajadores agricolas de la Granja Cooperativa de Wonhwa del distrito de Phyongwon de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur, la de Sin-am del distrito de Ryongchon de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte y la de Pisan del distrito de Anbyon de la provincia de Kangwon expusieron su determinacion revolucionaria de apoyar fielmente con la produccion de arroz la direccion del Maximo Dirigente para solucionar sin falta el problema alimentario del pueblo.
					
					　Los funcionarios, cientificos y creadores de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, la Casa de Creacion Mansudae, el Instituto Arquitectonico Paektusan, la Casa de Creacion de Guiones Cinematograficos de Corea dirigieron cartas con la firme decision de conducir la revolucion industrial del nuevo siglo con los exitos de investigacion cientifica de punta y poner en pleno manifiesto la capacidad espiritual de las masas a traves de las obras maestras de la epoca.
					
					　Los funcionarios del Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea, el CC de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas y el CC de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea escribieron que al aglutinar en torno al Maximo Dirigente a las masas de distintos estratos, cumpliran la mision de entidades que se dedican a educar a las masas y unirlas al partido.
					
					　Los funcionarios del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung decidieron defender a riesgo de la vida al querido Comandante Supremo al igual que los ex combatientes antijaponeses, quienes defendieron a ultranza al Presidente Kim Il Sung, mientras los alumnos del grupo D del sexto grado de la Escuela Secundaria No.1 de Pyongyang Este y numerosos jovenes solicitaron su admision al Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					　Los estudiantes de las escuelas de distintos niveles, tales como la Universidad Kim Il Sung, la Escuela Secundaria No.1 Kim Jong Suk y la Escuela Primaria Pulgungori de Pyongyang expusieron su voluntad de continuar el linaje de la revolucion del Juche y la causa del Songun.

articles.title: Premier coreano toma medidas para aumentar la produccion de abono
articles.content:
Premier coreano toma medidas para aumentar la produccion de abono
　Pyongyang, 14 de enero (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Choe Yong Rim visito el dia 13 el Complejo Quimico Juventud de Namhung, gran base de industria quimica, para enterarse de sus gestiones administrativas.
					　Los funcionarios y otros obreros del complejo registran auge en la produccion desde el comienzo del ano sintiendose orgullosos de trabajar en donde estan grabadas las imborrables huellas de orientacion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente          Kim Jong Il.
					
					　Dando vueltas por el taller de compresor, el proceso petroquimico y otros puntos, se cercioro del estado de produccion y administracion de la empresa y convoco una reunion de trabajo con los funcionarios interesados para tratar los problemas que se presentan en el incremento de produccion del abono Juche.
					
					　En la ocasion se abordaron los asuntos para enviar mucha cantidad de abono a las zonas rurales al materializar a toda costa las tareas combativas presentadas por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il en su recorrido por el complejo y modernizar todos los procesos productivos en base a las ciencias y tecnicas de ultima generacion.
					
					　Quedaron asignadas las tareas para hacer que la industria electrica y la carbonifera suministren suficientemente la electricidad y carbon necesarios a la produccion de abonos y que la rama de transporte ferroviario traslade a tiempo a las centrales termoelectricas, fabricas y empresas el carbon excavado en las minas hulleras mediante la distribucion eficiente de trenes.

articles.title: En Pyongyang delegacion de AP
articles.content:
En Pyongyang delegacion de AP
　Pyongyang, 14 de enero (ACNC) -- Arribo el dia 14 a esta capital la delegacion de la agencia de noticias de Estados Unidos AP encabezada por su presidente Thomas Curley.

articles.title: ATCC comenta vil artimana de los titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
Editado tomo 13 de "Obras escogidas de Kim Jong Il"
　Pyongyang, 14 de enero (ACNC) -- La Editora del Partido del Trabajo de Corea dio a luz el tomo 13 (edicion aumentada) de "Obras escogidas de         Kim Jong Il".
					　El volumen comprende 22 trabajos como discursos, charlas y mensajes publicados por el Dirigente desde junio del 78 (1989) a octubre del 79 (1990) de la Era Juche.
					
					　En sus obras "El Partido del Trabajo de Corea es el organizador y orientador de todas las victorias de nuestro pueblo", "Fortalezcamos el Partido y elevemos mas su papel rector" y otras, el Dirigente dio respuesta cientifica a los asuntos de principio que se presentan en la construccion del partido y sus actividades.
					
					　En las otras "Mantengamos y hagamos brillar mas el socialismo a nuestro estilo con la bandera de la idea Juche en alto" y "Sobre algunos problemas referentes a la base ideologica del socialismo", revelo el caracter reaccionario de las maniobras y sofismas de los imperialistas y los revisionistas contemporaneos tendentes a exterminar el socialismo.
					
					　La obra "Pongamos de pleno manifiesto el espiritu de conceder primacia a la nacion coreana" aclara la esencia del espiritu de conceder primacia a la nacion coreana y la idea y teoria de materializarlo.
					
					　"Para realizar cabalmente la revolucion en el sector de la industria ligera", "Para mejorar y fortalecer las labores financieras y bancarias" y otras obras indican las tareas que se presentan para mejorar la vida del pueblo y acelerar vigorosamente la construccion de la economia socialista.
					
					　"Preparemos firmemente a los jovenes como fidedignos continuadores de la causa revolucionaria del Juche", "Para formar a los jovenes coreanos residentes en Japon como continuadores de la causa patriotica dignos de confianza" y otras obras contienen las instrucciones programaticas del Dirigente de formar a la juventud como sucesor de la revolucion y llevar adelante con energia el movimiento de los coreanos residentes en Japon por la autoctona via.
					
					　Ademas el nuevo tomo recopila las obras que dan respuestas a los asuntos teoricos y practicos surgidos en varias ramas de la construccion del socialismo.
